data.author: Confucius
data.quote: I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.

data.author: Leo Buscaglia
data.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing-that's why we recommend it daily.

data.author: Donald Laird
data.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.

data.author: William Butler Yeats
data.quote: Education is not the filling of the pail, but, the lighting of the fire.

data.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
data.quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
data.quote: Instruction does much, but encouragement does everything.

data.author: Mike Ditka
data.quote: The ones who want to achieve and win championships motivate themselves.

data.author: Jim Ryun
data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

data.author: Lou Holtz
data.quote: Motivation is simple. You eliminate those who are not motivated.

data.author: Pat Riley
data.quote: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.

data.author: Max Schmelling
data.quote: Why did I want to win? because I didn't want to lose!

data.author: Francie Larrieu Smith
data.quote: The most important thing about motivation is goal setting. You should always have a goal.

data.author: Harriet Braiker
data.quote: Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.

data.author: Peter Davies
data.quote: Motivation is like food for the brain. You cannot get enough in one sitting. It needs continual and regular top ups.

data.author: Herman Cain
data.quote: Nobody motivates today's workers. If it doesn't come from within, it doesn't come. Fun helps remove the barriers that allow people to motivate themselves.

data.author: Dale Carnegie
data.quote: There is only one way... to get anybody to do anything. And that is by making the other person want to do it.

data.author: Jerry Gillies
data.quote: Make sure you visualize what you really want, not what someone else wants for you.

data.author: Walter Savage Landor
data.quote: We talk on principal, but act on motivation.
